constituent: wrenching, finger, fingers, wish, wishbone, now, clock, heart
heisigStory: This kanji does not refer to the tool but to the act of twisting. Its elements: fingers . . . wish.
koohiiStory1: Ever try WRENCHING a bolt with just your FINGERS? Trust me, you´ll WISH you had a wrench for WRENCHING to save your FINGERS.
koohiiStory2: I have an unfortunate habit of wrenching off other people’s fingers when I pull a wishbone with them.
kunYomi: ね.じる、ねじ.る、ひね.くる、ひね.る
words: to twist, to wrench, to screw
turn (a switch) on or off, twist, puzzle over
